title: Pearl Drop Kundan Jhumka Earrings - A Timeless South Indian Classic
materials: Base metal with high-quality gold plating
embellished with sparkling Kundan stones and a single
lustrous faux pearl drop on each earring. The plating mimics the traditional Hyderabadi Polish for a rich
features: Classic Jhumka bell shape with intricate Kundan stone detailing throughout. The design features delicate floral motifs on the ear studs, leading to a tiered Jhumka bell pattern. The openwork design allows light to reflect beautifully off the Kundan stones. A single, perfectly round pearl drop adds a touch of elegance and completes the traditional aesthetic.
colors: Predominantly gold with brilliant white (Kundan) and a soft
creamy pearl hue. The gold finish replicates the warmth of 22K gold
creating a classic South Indian color palette.
occasions: or any special occasion where you want to showcase traditional South Indian elegance. Suitable for both traditional and contemporary outfits.
description: These Kundan Jhumkas offer the timeless beauty of traditional South Indian jewelry with a modern touch. The faux pearl drop adds sophistication, while the Kundan stones provide dazzling brilliance. Lightweight and comfortable to wear, they are perfect for extended events. A valuable addition to any jewelry collection, representing a blend of heritage and style. Represents excellent craftsmanship.
